mahajana eksath peramune nayaka amathi dinesh gunawardhana mahatha, uthuru nagenahira palath pradhana karagena koti thrasthawadin eelam deshayak athikirimata, wenama ratak bihikirimata thathkarana awasthawala eyata erehiwa mathru bhumiya eksesath kirimata akhanda satanak genagiya apa rate hitapu nayakayan pasdenekuta eya parajaya karanna bariwuna. 2005 di balayata pamini janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata itha keti kalayakin 2009 mayi 19 wana dina koti thrasthawadaya paradawa rata eksesath kirimata puluwankama labuna.

ayi ithin mata dura penima awulne as hatharen lokaya balana mama wada karaddi nam as dekin wada karanne,man hithuwa danna kenek wenna athi kiyala math atha wanala ape aachchita kiwwa man adunana kenek wenta athi kiyala.eka edayin iwara una kiyamuko....eeta passe dawase idan kalu jathika piyathuma hamadama udeta math ekka katha karanawa.kohomada?lankawa gana,wada gana ahaddi mama kiwwa lankawe ayata job aduyi kiyala ,ithin piyathuma mage mobayil nambareth illagena palliyata ena aya ge gewal wala job thibunoth dennam kiyala kiwwa,math ha kiwwa kata hari goda enna atha denna puluwanne kiyala hithala,eeta passe athata atha dila sipachara karala samugaththa,(kattiya dan waradiyata hithanna epa ithaliye hodata danna kiyana aayo me widihata kammulata kammula thiyala sipachara karana eka samanaya deyak hode...)......mayi,habiyayi rata kama kala dawase wechcha dewal katha kara kara payak withara kama mese idagena inna eka puruddata giya deyak ithin eda hawasath man piyathuma gana kiya kiya iddi habiya wihilu kara kara kiyapi "me piyathuma nam ena pota hoda na suda,palliye kanikka pettiya thiyena thana aha ganna balanna" kiyala, onna apriyal pasku kale man wada iwara weddi ,sahenna hawas wenawa aachchige lamayin okkoma mehe pasku samaranna ena nisa wenadata wada man kalin wadata aawa .

ebawin owun dedena sambandha siddhin wiwechanaya kirima paseka thaba guru wruththiya mebadu pirihunu thathwayakata path kale kawurunda, kumak sandahada, eya walakwa ganimata kala yuthu, kala haki yamak thawa ithiriwa thibeda yanna pilibandawa samajiya kathikawak, sanwadayak athi kirima thawath ' kalyani la ' siya gananak idiriyedi nirmanaya wima walakwa ganimata gathahaki hondama kriyamargayayi.
